channel.title: Anyone know how to add pnpc command with animations for 718+ server?
channel.description:
I would really like to know because the other tutorials are useless when they tell you to search for a line of code that does not exist in the file I am in.
Please help, thank you.
The original pnpc command doesnt exist/work, and yes, I am owner of the server.

item.title: Anyone know how to add pnpc command with animations for 718+ server?
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

[quote=“gimpie, post:3, topic:491970”][quote author=Potzon link=topic=610202.msg4234331#msg4234331 date=1361472912]

case "tonpc": if (cmd.length < 2) { player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage( "Use: ::tonpc id(-1 for player)"); return true; } try { player.getAppearence().transformIntoNPC( Integer.valueOf(cmd[1])); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { player.getPackets().sendPanelBoxMessage( "Use: ::tonpc id(-1 for player)"); } return true;
This might be what your looking for, I suppose?
[/quote]
Would this go in my commands.java or my client.java?[/quote]

This would be placed in your Commands.java.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know how to add pnpc command with animations for 718+ server?
